metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8363 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The flac_buffer_copy function in flac.c in libsndfile 1.0.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted audio file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8363` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.1
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.1').
